title: Google\Cloud\Language\V1beta2\ClassificationCategory
name: ClassificationCategory
description:
Represents a category returned from the text classifier.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.language.v1beta2.ClassificationCategory

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name of the category representing the document, from the predefined taxonomy.

params.name: data.confidence
params.description: The classifier's confidence of the category. Number represents how certain the classifier is that this category represents the given text.
